author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Agora Signs Agreement For Sale Of Real Estate For 19 Mln Zlotys
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - AGORA SA
* SAID ON MONDAY IT HAS SIGNED AN AGREEMENT FOR TRANSFER OF PERPETUAL USUFRUCT OF A PROPERTY IN WARSAW
* TOTAL VALUE OF THE TRANSACTION IS 19.0 MILLION ZLOTYS NET
* THE TRANSACTION WILL HAVE A POSITIVE EFFECT ON THE COMPANYâ€˜S OPERATING PROFIT AND WILL REACH 8.3 MILLION ZLOTYS IN Q1 OF 2018
